text: @HumanityForward I mother of 8 with 6 kids live in home Fulltime 2 boys live w dad visit every weekend holiday It has been extremely difficult to care for my children two of them disabled not able to receive proper schooling or therapy services Im a single mother lost my job due to Covid-19
